rdf:Description.dc:title: East Peak Climate ; IITF East Peak Hourly Climate
rdf:Description.dc:description: The overall goal of this effort is to monitor the surface climate of the upper Luquillo Mountains. This station provides basic hourly and daily climate data that is comparable to the Bisley and El Verde stations at lower elevations. It also provides the long-term reference data that supplements shorter-term, high frequency measurements.; PUBLICATIONS: Weaver, P.L., E. Medina, D. Pool, K. Dugget, J. Gonzales-Liboy, E. Cuvas, 1986. Ecological Observations in the Cloud Forests of the Luquillo Mountains in Puerto Rico. Biotropica 18(1):69-82
